entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF FREEZING DRIZZLE THIS MORNING, THEN SUNNY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

NORTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
